dialogue.rumors.lore/1: Even though Jax be still worshipped, the worship o' Sirben be increasin' 'n his prophets MerlinWolfGames 'n Crow are spreadin' his words.
dialogue.rumors.lore/2: Cyberdemons once tried t' invade us 'n boarded the Overworld wit' Portals, but Sirben 'n Luke 'ave stopped the Invasion.
dialogue.rumors.lore/3: Aft bein' involved in the disappearance o' the Ancient Builder, rumours are, 2DA50 travelled t' the Far Lands 'n was ne'er heard o' again.
dialogue.rumors.lore/4: MerlinWolfGames build a temple devoted t' Sirben, his temple be one o' the ancient wonders.
dialogue.rumors.lore/5: Thar used t' be an ancient race o' builders, but now they be gone.
dialogue.rumors.lore/6: Did ye hear about the legends o' the ancient builders? The ones who left all those ruins 'n temples all o'er the Overworld.

teen.dialogue.first.generic/2: Oh? A traveler. We be naught special. Ye like enough won't stay more than a day, two tops. Nice gettin' t' know ye though, I guess.
teen.dialogue.first.generic/3: Oh, ahoy. So, ye're a traveler…? I used t' dream o' becomin' a traveler when I was a sprog, but now that I be gettin' older, I be nah so sure anymore… it's so dangerous outside o' the village, ain't it?
teen.dialogue.first.generic/4: Oh, ahoy! It's always cool t' see another traveler! Do ye 'ave some interestin' tales, perhaps?!
guard.dialogue.first.generic/1: Ahoy, ye be expected t' abide by our laws durin' yer stay. I expect no trouble from ye.
guard.dialogue.first.generic/2: Ahoy, traveler. Mind yer manners while ye're here.
guard.dialogue.first.generic/3: Mind yourself, traveler. We take safety mighty seriously around here.
guard.dialogue.first.generic/4: I haven't seen yer face around here afore. Are ye a traveler…? I hope ye know how t' behave yourself… fer yer owns good.
guard.dialogue.first.generic/5: Ye look new here. Ahoy! As long as ye're nah wit' the pillagers…
weaponsmith.dialogue.first.generic/1: Ahoy, traveler! I am this fine village's weaponsmith! Why don't ye take a look at me wares? A brave traveler like yourself surely needs t' be well-equipped!
weaponsmith.dialogue.first.generic/2: Me, me, if this ain't an adventurer! Ahoy! Someone like ye surely needs the best weapons, 'n as luck would 'ave it, I be the best weaponsmith fer miles! Don't be shy, take a peek at me wares!
weaponsmith.dialogue.first.generic/3: Ahoy t' our village! If ye 'ave the time t' spare, me gears could use a gander. I be quite sure we can strike a good deal, ye 'n I!
armorer.dialogue.first.generic/1: Ahoy. As an adventurer, ye shall know how crucial 'tis that ye stay protected. So, if ye find yourself in needs o' new armor, ye know where t' look!
armorer.dialogue.first.generic/2: Ah, a traveler? 'ave ye been lookin' fer quality armor that could withstand blows from the mightiest o' monsters?! Well, look no more!
armorer.dialogue.first.generic/3: Ahoy, 'n ahoy t' our village! It's been a while since last we saw an adventurer. Me? I be a local armorer! I bet someone like ye needs good armor on thar journeys!
butcher.dialogue.first.generic/1: Ahoy, traveler! If ye needs fill fer a starvin' stomach, ye've found starb'rd galleon!
butcher.dialogue.first.generic/2: Ah, ye must be this traveler everyone be natterin' about! A simple butcher I might be, but even I know such journeys can be tiresome, even t' an adventurer such as yourself! Why don't ye stop by fer a bite or two?
butcher.dialogue.first.generic/3: Ahoy! The best meat in town, perfect fer any ravenous adventurer! Come now, afore I get sold out!
fisherman.dialogue.first.generic/1: Oh, ye're a traveler? Ahoy, I am this fine village's fisherman. If ye feel starvin' fer some quality fresh fish, ye know where t' find me!
fisherman.dialogue.first.generic/2: Ah, an adventurer! Someone like ye surely must know the value o' hard work! In such a case, why don't ye take a peek at me catches?
fisherman.dialogue.first.generic/3: Ahoy t' our village! I be this village's fisherman, as ye can see. I be sure someone who travels the world far 'n wide such as yourself must know a thing or two, as well! If ye needs any help wit' fishin', I'd be more than happy t' help. Fer a price, o' course!
farmer.dialogue.first.generic/1: Ahoy, traveler. As ye can see, It's hard work t' keep everyone fed in this village, so I will pay handsomely if ye could help me catch a break in the fields.
farmer.dialogue.first.generic/2: Ahoy t' our village, adventurer. Farmin' be hard work, but I be still proud o' it. Be sure t' swing by, I'll always 'ave grub in stock.
farmer.dialogue.first.generic/3: Oh! An adventurer! Why, ahoy thar! I be a proud village farmer. If ye needs any help, feel free t' jus' ask.
cleric.dialogue.first.generic/1: Ahoy, adventurer. Ahoy t' our wee village. As ye might 'ave guessed, I be a cleric. If ye find yourself in needs o' various potions, I would be more than happy t' help.
cleric.dialogue.first.generic/2: Ahoy, adventurer. Please feel at home in our village, 'n may the god's light be wit' ye. Do nah hesitate t' ask fer help if ye find yourself in needs.
cleric.dialogue.first.generic/3: I be this village's cleric. I am responsible fer healin' those o' us unfortunate enough t' fall t' the plague. If ye ever happen t' come across rotten flesh, hesitate nah, 'n bring 'em t' me.
librarian.dialogue.first.generic/1: Oh, so ye must be the traveler I keep hearin' about. Well, ahoy t' this humble village o' ours, I be the local librarian. Ye're always ahoy t' look around me library; jus' be sure t' be silent as ye peruse the books.
librarian.dialogue.first.generic/2: Ahoy, traveler. I am this town's librarian. Behave well, 'n ye'll always be ahoy in the library. I also try me hand at enchantin'. Perhaps some o' me enchanted books might pique yer curiosity?
librarian.dialogue.first.generic/3: Ahoy, good traveler. 'tis always a pleasure t' meet someone new, thar's no better way t' broaden one's horizons such as tales from afar. Yer kind may find me tales 'enchantin'' as well.
cartographer.dialogue.first.generic/1: Ahoy, explorer. I be this village's cartographer. It's me job t' map the secrets o' this world 'n I would be willin' t' share the fruits o' me labor wit' ye… fer a price, o' course.
cartographer.dialogue.first.generic/2: Ah! An adventurer! Someone like ye surely has t' recognize the value o' me work. I am a cartographer, 'n am more than happy t' sell ye me maps, as well as buy the resources. I could always use some spare paper!
cartographer.dialogue.first.generic/3: Oh, I've been waitin' fer ye t' show up, explorer! If ye ever happen t' find yourself in needs o' help wit' findin' treasures o' ole, I will be more than happy t' assist ye wit' me knowledge.
mason.dialogue.first.generic/1: Ahoy, traveler. I be this town's mason. If ye ever needs help wit' stone materials 'n the doubloons t' back it up, I'd be more than happy t' help!
mason.dialogue.first.generic/2: Ahoy, adventurer! Fer me line o' work, I needs materials, lots o' materials. I'd be willin' t' buy off any spare clay on ye!
fletcher.dialogue.first.generic/1: Ahoy, brave adventurer!. I be this village's fletcher. A bow be an adventurer's best matey, especially if ye hope t' best a creeper. Why don't ye look at me wares sometime?
fletcher.dialogue.first.generic/2: Ahoy! I am certain someone like ye has t' appreciate wha' advantages bows offer! Ye've got t' be low on arrows, bein' on the road so much!
leatherworker.dialogue.first.generic/1: Ahoy, traveler. I am this village's leatherworker. As ye like enough know, it's me job t' make sure everyone has fine clothes t' wear. I would be most obliged if ye ever checked me stock.
leatherworker.dialogue.first.generic/2: Ahoy t' this village. I am sure someone like ye often happens t' collect leathers from all kinds o' animals, 'n I would be happy t' buy 'em off ye.
shepherd.dialogue.first.generic/1: Ahoy, adventurer. I be this village's shepherd, as ye can prolly tell. Me wares prolly don't amount t' that much, but please still feel ahoy t' look at me wares.
shepherd.dialogue.first.generic/2: Ahoy, adventurer. I am this village's shepherd. If ye ever happen t' 'ave spare amounts o' wool, please let me 'ave a look. I jus' might buy 'em off ye.
dialogue.first.question/1: Ahoy traveler. Wha' brings ye t' this village?
dialogue.first.question/2: Finally a new face! Wha' adventures brought ye here?
dialogue.first.question/3: Yarr! Are ye an adventurer? How'd ye get here?
dialogue.first.exploring/1: We don't 'ave much here, but ye be ahoy here, as long as ye don't break any rules.
dialogue.first.exploring/2: Abide by the laws 'n ye're ahoy t' stay, traveler.
dialogue.first.settling/1: It's great t' see another face in the village!
dialogue.first.settling/3: Happy t' 'ave another helpin' hand around here!
dialogue.first.spent_night.success/1: I can recommend ye our inn.
dialogue.first.spent_night.success/2: Our inn be the best galleon around here t' recover some energy.
dialogue.first.spent_night.success/3: Wants a warm cot 'n good grub? Jus' go t' our inn!
dialogue.first.spent_night.failed/1: We don't 'ave an inn. T' be honest, we lack the expertise t' build a proper one.
dialogue.first.spent_night.failed/2: We don't 'ave an inn here, sorry about that!
dialogue.first.spent_night.failed/3: Maybe ye'd 'ave better luck in another village?
dialogue.hug.success/3: At least one thing made me day today.
dialogue.hug.success/4: Ye're as snuggly as a sheep!
dialogue.hug.fail/2: Thanks, I'll try t' keep this alive fer a while.
dialogue.hug.fail/4: Aft ye called me a dinosaur last week? No.
dialogue.hug.fail/5: Quite frankly, ye don't deserve a hug aft ye did that.
dialogue.hug.fail/6: Blow me down, get off me! Ye 'ave ghastly germs!
spouse.dialogue.hug.success/1: I love bein' entangled in yer arms!
spouse.dialogue.hug.success/2: Belay that, don't weigh anchor... ye're warm.
spouse.dialogue.hug.success/3: Would ye rather only bein' able t' hug or kiss?
spouse.dialogue.hug.success/5: Let's stay like this here fore'er!
spouse.dialogue.hug.fail/1: Why don't ye go hug yer ex?
spouse.dialogue.hug.fail/2: Thanks, I'll try t' keep this alive fer a while.
childp.dialogue.hug.success/1: *Kisses on yer cheek* Ye're the best ever!
childp.dialogue.hug.success/2: I be goin' t' be as strong as ye be one day!
childp.dialogue.hug.success/3: I love sweets! Thank ye mighty much!
childp.dialogue.hug.success/4: I love hugs! Ye're soft 'n warm!
childp.dialogue.hug.fail/1: I be too ole fer hugs!
childp.dialogue.hug.fail/2: Belay that! I don't wants scallywags t' see!
childp.dialogue.hug.fail/3: Walk the plank, ye're so annoyin'!
childp.dialogue.hug.fail/4: Jus' leave me alone or give me some cookies!
dialogue.kiss.success/1: I wish this here moment would last fore'er.
dialogue.kiss.success/3: Shiver me timbers, tastes like pumpkin pie!
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success/1: I fall in love all o'er again when our lips meet!
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success/2: Time stops tickin' when I be wit' ye.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success/5: I wouldna trade ye fer anyone in the world!
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success/8: I dunno where I'd be without ye!
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/1: Nah where someone can see us...
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/2: We don't 'ave t' if ye don't wants t'.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/3: Yer breath smells like wolf kibble.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/4: Go take rum from the lake.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/5: Now that we be married I can tell ye how lousy ye be at kissin'.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/6: Blow me down! Wha' did ye eat recently? I reckon I touched some grub!
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/7: Babe! Nah in front o' the trees!
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail/8: %1$s I be nah in the mood right now.
dialogue.chat.success/1: Scallywag, cookies 'n milk does sound delicious right now.
dialogue.chat.success/2: Aye, I suppose the weather be nice today.
dialogue.chat.success/3: I be doin' jus' fine! Hit me toe when I woke up, though.
dialogue.chat.success/4: An apple a day keeps the zombies away!
dialogue.chat.success/5: Me dream be t' build me owns village, but I be so lazy.
dialogue.chat.success/6: I reckon I saw %Supporter% the other day in Diamond armor.
dialogue.chat.success/7: Me hearty %Supporter% told me that they found a chest full o' diamonds yesterday!
dialogue.chat.success/8: Ain't the weather remarkable? I've personally enjoyed the more sunny weather.
dialogue.chat.success/9: I've lived here me whole life 'n I don't understand wha''s the big deal wit' these spiders 'n goblins.
dialogue.chat.success/10: Arrrgh. I do wonder as well about wha' happened t' %Supporter%. They ventured from here about a year ago.
dialogue.chat.success/12: Did ye hear wha' happened t' %Supporter% the other day?
dialogue.chat.success/13: I've been meanin' t' adopt one o' the stray cats around here, but I've been so busy lately.
dialogue.chat.success/14: I would like t' redecorate me ship soon. I be jus' too lazy.
dialogue.chat.success/15: I hope t' 'ave sprogs one day, I jus' needs t' find starb'rd partner.
dialogue.chat.success/16: I wonder where I'd be if I chose t' live in the other village.
dialogue.chat.success/17: I wench me childhood sometimes, a lot o' memories cherished. Mighty good times.
dialogue.chat.success/18: Haven't nattered t' me elders in a while either, I shall go visit 'em sometime.
dialogue.chat.success/19: I've been needin' t' travel t' the other village nigh here, I 'ave a few mateys that I haven't seen in a long time.
dialogue.chat.success/20: Sometimes, I dream about a grub called cheese..
dialogue.chat.fail/1: Did ye seriously jus' say that?
dialogue.chat.fail/2: I don't believe it exploded on its owns.
dialogue.chat.fail/3: Ye know, ye're nah that cool.
dialogue.chat.fail/5: Ye best be thrown in a dungeon!
dialogue.chat.fail/6: Blisterin' barnacles. Walk the plank, ye dress like ye're from the past.
dialogue.chat.fail/7: That be such a squiffy thing t' natter about.
dialogue.chat.fail/8: Why are ye natterin' t' me again?
dialogue.chat.fail/9: Shiver me timbers? Did ye say somethin'? Sorry, I didn' care t' listen.
dialogue.chat.fail/11: Wha' be wrong wit' ye? Why are ye natterin' about this?
dialogue.chat.fail/12: I've heard harsh things about ye, I can kinda see why they reckon that.
dialogue.chat.fail/13: Nah even zombies will natter t' ye.
dialogue.chat.fail/14: Ye're as unlikeable as a witch!
dialogue.chat.fail/15: Don't natter t' me or I will call the guards t' move ye away from me.
dialogue.chat.fail/16: Blimey? Oh sorry, yer natter bored me.
dialogue.chat.fail/18: I wonder if anyone will wench yer babblin' when yer mouth suddenly "stays shut" forever.
dialogue.chat.fail/19: I'd rather stare at a pigs rear than natter t' ye.
dialogue.chat.fail/20: Are ye finished natterin' t' me?
dialogue.chat.fail/21: Wha', ye believe the earth be round? Wha' do ye mean round? No corners? Ye seriously believe that?
child.dialogue.chat.success/1: I heard tales about ye! Are ye a hero?
child.dialogue.chat.success/2: Ahoy. I was goin' t' go try 'n climb t' the roof.
child.dialogue.chat.success/3: Do ye wanna go burn stuff wit' me?
child.dialogue.chat.success/4: I be goin' t' be a hunter like ye 'n scuttle many things!
child.dialogue.chat.success/5: Ahoy! Wha' are ye doin' today? I be goin' swimmin'!
child.dialogue.chat.success/6: Do ye 'ave sprogs? I wants t' play wit' 'em!
child.dialogue.chat.fail/1: If ye don't give me cookies I'll hold me breath.
child.dialogue.chat.fail/2: Me elders said nah t' natter t' ye, that ye're bad.
child.dialogue.chat.fail/4: Oh aye? Well I be gonna egg yer galleon!
child.dialogue.chat.fail/5: Lalala, I be nah listenin'! Lalala.
child.dialogue.chat.fail/6: If ye don't leave me alone, I be goin' t' scream!
child.dialogue.chat.fail/7: Mommy says she finds it weird ye don't 'ave a job in the village...
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/1: I swabed the entire ship. How was yer day?
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/2: Honey, let's go campin' sometime. Doesn't that sound like fun?
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/3: So today I saw a spider. 'twas huge so I ran away.
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/4: We shall build a new galleon together!
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/5: I well-nigh walked into a lava pit the other day. That wouldna 'ave been good!
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/6: Can we 'ave sprogs? Jus' imagine seein' our wee ones runnin' around!
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/7: We shall vacation t' a beach one day!
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/8: I'd love t' 'ave pets one day. Preferably cats.
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/9: I'd love t' 'ave pets one day. Preferably dogs.
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/10: I'd love t' 'ave pets one day. Preferably parrots.
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/11: I thought I saw some pillagers earlier, it might be me eyes playin' tricks on me.
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/12: I dreamt about becomin' a elder! I be nah that ole am I?
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/13: I saw a pond while explorin', 'twas so peaceful t' look at. Wish ye we be thar!
spouse.dialogue.chat.success/14: I saw me ole scallywag Ash at the village center the other day. 'twas awkward t' say the least.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/1: I know we be nah the poorest family, but...
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/2: I love bein' around ye but I needs some space.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/3: Sometimes I wish I had me owns "cave" t' escape from ye 'n everyone.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/4: Walk the plank, I be nah in the mood.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/5: Where 'ave ye been? Are ye seein' someone behind me back?
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/6: Babe, don't ye 'ave anythin' t' do right now?
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/7: %1$s I love ye, but I needs t' be alone fer a wee bit.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/8: Don't ye 'ave hearties t' natter t'? Go make some mateys.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/9: Honey, ye're beginnin' t' nag me at this point.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/11: Ye must mighty wants me t' jump into a nether portal.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail/12: Darlin' I be tired, natter t' me later.
childp.dialogue.chat.success/1: Oh, I was jus' goin' t' go explorin' later.
childp.dialogue.chat.success/3: Ahoy, can ye make me a cake?
childp.dialogue.chat.success/4: Can I 'ave me owns cabin away from our ship? That would be cool!
childp.dialogue.chat.success/5: Let's move into a cave! that there sounds so fun!
childp.dialogue.chat.success/6: I wanna go t' the beach!
childp.dialogue.chat.success/7: Can we get a cur? Please?
childp.dialogue.chat.success/8: Can we get a kitten? Please?
childp.dialogue.chat.success/9: Can we get a parrot? Please?
childp.dialogue.chat.success/10: Me bucko told me he found a lush cave! Can I go?
childp.dialogue.chat.success/11: Me bucko told me he found a dripstone cave! Can I go?
childp.dialogue.chat.success/12: Me bucko, Ash wants me t' go t' a lush cave, but I was scared.
childp.dialogue.chat.success/13: Me bucko, Ash wants me t' go t' a dripstone cave, but I was scared.
childp.dialogue.chat.success/14: Can ye tell me how sprogs are born?

childp.dialogue.chat.fail/7: I don't wants a sprog sister.
childp.dialogue.chat.fail/9: I be playin' wit' me toys walk the plank
dialogue.story.success/1: Mighty? I can nah believe that all happened!
dialogue.story.success/2: I wish I was brave enough t' take on a creeper.
dialogue.story.success/3: That was a mighty good tale! Be it original?
dialogue.story.success/5: I was nigh thar yesterday, I can nah believe I didn' hear this already.
dialogue.story.success/6: Har har har! That definitely sounds like %Supporter%! Such an awesome scallywag.
dialogue.story.success/7: I've heard the Legend o' %Supporter% nigh-on a million times. Tell me again!
dialogue.story.success/8: Shiver me timbers! So that's how ye found yer first diamond?
dialogue.story.success/9: Ye shall come o'er later! I would love t' hear more.

dialogue.joke.creative.success/6: BAHAHHA! That was the best joke I've heard in a long time!
dialogue.joke.creative.success/7: Teehee! Ye're definitely funnier than Ash!

spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success/1: *Laughs* I married ye fer yer humor!
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success/2: Ye shall throw an egg at 'im next time!
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success/4: Here's one fer ye... How many chickens does a creeper blow up?
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success/5: 'tis why I married ye! One o' the best qualities ye 'ave!
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/4: Ye needs t' erase that from yer mind.
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.success/2: I've got t' tell me hearty that one!
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.success/3: 'ow did the creeper erupt into flame, thar she blows?!
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.success/4: *Laughs* Why be thar no longer 3 o' 'em?
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/1: I thought ye we be funny, though...
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/2: I be likin' knock knock jokes better.
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/3: I don't get it, that was squiffy.
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail/4: *Yawn* Me bucko's cap'n be cooler 'n funnier than ye.
dialogue.greet: Ahoy! How are ye doin' today?
dialogue.greet.kind: I be goodhow fares yer day?
dialogue.procreate_engaged/1: I’d feel more comfortable once we’re actually married.
dialogue.procreate_engaged/2: I don’t wants t' bein' a new life into this world if we haven’t even fully committed t' each other.
dialogue.shake_hand.success/2: Yer grip shows me ye 'ave great power!
dialogue.shake_hand.success/3: Blow me down, ye're so polite!
dialogue.shake_hand.success/4: Here's luck 'n a fair wind t' ye!
dialogue.shake_hand.fail/1: Seriously? Aft ye slaughtered the cow?
dialogue.shake_hand.fail/3: I be nah a stranger, ye don't 'ave t' be so polite.
dialogue.shake_hand.fail/4: Blow me down mighty? This ain't like ye.
child.dialogue.shake_hand.success/1: Ahoy! Someone I know likes ye...
child.dialogue.shake_hand.success/2: Cap'n said 'tis a mighty nice thing t' do.
child.dialogue.shake_hand.success/3: Now high five! Down low... too slow!
child.dialogue.shake_hand.success/5: *Giggles* I jus' swabed a cow wit' this hand.
child.dialogue.shake_hand.fail/2: Mom, cap'n! This scallywag be trying t' kidnap me!
child.dialogue.shake_hand.fail/3: Don't touch me I be famous!
child.dialogue.shake_hand.fail/4: Garr, yer hand has black stuff on it.
child.dialogue.shake_hand.fail/5: I'll only shake yer hand if ye give me a diamond.
spouse.dialogue.shake_hand.success/3: One day scallywags will forget t' shake hands.
spouse.dialogue.shake_hand.success/4: Our sprogs will needs t' be this polite.
spouse.dialogue.shake_hand.success/5: *Continues t' shake hand* Tell me when t' stop!
spouse.dialogue.shake_hand.fail/1: Shakin' hands? How about a kiss, instead?
spouse.dialogue.shake_hand.fail/5: Why don't ye get a decent job instead o' shakin' me hand?
childp.dialogue.shake_hand.success/1: Why do I needs t' learn this stuff?
childp.dialogue.shake_hand.success/2: I heard that 'tis a polite thing t' do.
childp.dialogue.shake_hand.success/3: I be gonna be jus' like ye when I grow up!
childp.dialogue.shake_hand.success/5: I don't get it, but aye!
childp.dialogue.shake_hand.fail/4: I'll shake yer hand if ye give me cake.
dialogue.main.morning/1: Here's luck 'n a fair wind t' ye!
dialogue.main.morning/5: Looks like ye had a rough night.
dialogue.main.morning/6: Rise 'n shine, scallywag. It's goin' t' be a long day.
dialogue.main.morning/7: Did ye sleep well? Ye look chipper.
dialogue.main.morning/9: Wha' a beautiful mornin'! I reckon it's goin' t' be a productive day today!
dialogue.main.morning/10: I reckon I might take it slow today, I be nah feelin' too well.
dialogue.main.morning/11: I 'ave a mighty packed schedule today, jus' thinkin' about it makes me tired.
dialogue.main.morning/12: I actually got a decent night's sleep, I might do somethin' a bit heavier today, who knows?
child.dialogue.main.morning/2: I might go flower pickin' today, wanna come?
child.dialogue.main.morning/3: I be goin' t' see me buckos! Are ye goin' t' see yers too?
child.dialogue.main.morning/4: I wants t' go explorin', but I 'ave t' finish me readin' today. Why can nah everyday be a play day?
child.dialogue.main.morning/5: I be nah allowed t' do anythin' fun today. 'tisn't fair.
child.dialogue.main.morning/6: Everyone be tired today! I can nah find anyone t' play wit' me.
child.dialogue.main.morning/7: Can ye take me somewhere today? I be bored.
teen.dialogue.main.morning/1: I wouldna be up this early if I had a choice.
teen.dialogue.main.morning/2: I was dragged out o' hammock, can ye tell?
teen.dialogue.main.morning/3: 'tis an unholy hour o' the mornin'. Why are ye so chipper?
teen.dialogue.main.morning/4: Time t' get movin', I guess.
teen.dialogue.main.morning/5: Wha' I wouldna give t' be back in cot.
teen.dialogue.main.morning/6: Do ye 'ave any grub on ye? I forgot t' eat grub.
dialogue.main.evening/1: Here's luck 'n a fair wind t' ye!
dialogue.main.evening/2: It got late pretty fast, how was yer day?
dialogue.main.evening/3: Another hard day o' work, am I right?
dialogue.main.evening/4: The day flew by, didn' it? Too much t' do, too wee time.
dialogue.main.evening/5: I reckon I might head home soon, I needs t' get started on grub.
dialogue.main.evening/6: I wasted too much time today, I didn' mighty do much.
dialogue.main.evening/7: I reckon I might go fer a nap soon, I had a rough mornin'.
dialogue.main.evening/8: I might go inside, last month I saw a creeper, I don't walk around at night anymore.
dialogue.main.evening/9: Oh ahoy! I was buyin' stuff fer grub at the butcher, natter t' ye later!
child.dialogue.main.evening/1: I 'ave t' be home soon, or me family might get worried.
child.dialogue.main.evening/2: It's gettin' mighty dark, mighty handsomely! Why are days so short?
child.dialogue.main.evening/3: I be a wee bit tired, but I can go a long time without a nap now!
child.dialogue.main.evening/4: I wants t' go around me bucko's galleon, but I be in trouble. Shall I go anyways?
child.dialogue.main.evening/5: I can go around the village all by meself now, even when it gets darker! But I wouldna mind if ye came wit' me.
teen.dialogue.main.evening/1: I be goin' t' go into the woods later, don't rat me out t' the guards, kay?
teen.dialogue.main.evening/2: I 'ave so much work t' finish, but I mighty don't wants t' do it. Needs help wit' anythin'?
teen.dialogue.main.evening/3: Thar's nah much t' do around here, especially when all the stores close.
teen.dialogue.main.evening/4: The guards don't let us stay out too late 'cause o' the monsters. It's mighty annoyin'. Ye don't reckon ye could sneak me out, could ye?
teen.dialogue.main.evening/5: I wanted t' hang out wit' the others today, but I didn' get the chance t'. Are ye free?
teen.dialogue.main.evening/7: I know it's dangerous at night, but at least it's quiet. It makes it easier t' reckon about stuff, ye know?
teen.dialogue.main.evening/8: ... maybe I shall fix me sleepin' schedule. It's so late but I don't feel tired at all
teen.dialogue.main.evening/9: The sunset sure looks cool, don't ye reckon? Like the sky was on fire… or somethin' like that.
teen.dialogue.main.evening/10: Well, 'tisn't too late fer another stroll. Thar's nah much else t' do in a village, ye know. Well, it like enough beats sleepin' next t' creepers fer all I know.
dialogue.main.night/2: A bit o' a night owl, aren't ye?
dialogue.main.night/4: Don't stray too far from the village. Wouldna wants ye t' get stuck out thar wit' the monsters, would we?
dialogue.main.night/5: The guards always make the village feel safer, but 'tis still awfully eerie at night, ain't it?
dialogue.main.night/6: The darkness always makes me feel peaceful, it's a nice time t' relax when the world be quiet.
dialogue.main.night/7: It's always so busy in the day time, so 'tis nice t' go fer a stroll when the stars are out.
dialogue.main.night/8: I be gettin' mighty tired. I suppose it's been a long day, I might needs t' take it easier on the morrow.
dialogue.main.night/9: I can nah wait t' burrow underneath the covers.
dialogue.main.night/10: Ye shall mighty go t' sleep. I hear ye 'ave a lot t' do on the morrow.
child.dialogue.main.night/1: *yawn* Why are ye up so late? It's so dark already.
child.dialogue.main.night/2: *yawn* Can nah we natter some other time? I be mighty, mighty, mighty sleepy.
child.dialogue.main.night/3: *jus' yawns 'n doesn't seem t' quite notice ye're thar*
child.dialogue.main.night/4: I be goin' t' play the whoooole day when I wake up…
teen.dialogue.main.night/1: Don't ye see I be trying t' sleep?
teen.dialogue.main.night/2: Go hunt those zombies outside or whatever ye adventurers do. I be trying t' sleep.
teen.dialogue.main.night/3: Why are ye in me ship at this hour?
teen.dialogue.main.night/4: Natter t' me one more time, 'n I be callin' the guards. Git.
teen.dialogue.main.night/5: Look, I appreciate it 'n all, but some scallywags are trying t' sleep at this hour.
teen.dialogue.main.night/6: I don't mean t' be mean or anythin', but ye shall like enough sleep too.
teen.dialogue.main.night/7: Shant ye be at yer owns ship at this hour or somethin'?.
teen.dialogue.main.night/10: *Clearly ain't asleep, but won't natter t' ye all the same.*
cultist.dialogue.main/1: Thar’s a lot ye still 'ave t' learn.
cultist.dialogue.main/2: If ye wonder how I 'ave all these Sirben sprogs then it’s a secret.
cultist.dialogue.main/3: Would ye like t' become one wit' the Sirbens..?
guard.dialogue.main/2: I’m a wee busy, please go bother someone else.
guard.dialogue.main/5: It’s a peaceful day, I hope it stays this peaceful.
guard.dialogue.main/6: Ye know, I once thought someone was attackin' me, when I realise I'd hit an armour stand. Didn' make that mistake twice.
guard.dialogue.main/7: I dunno who ye be, don't make me 'ave t' find out.
guard.dialogue.main/9: I've always wondered how strong a rose gold cutlass would be.
guard.dialogue.main/10: Did ye hear that? I be sure thar's somethin' out thar...
guard.dialogue.main.morning/1: Here's luck 'n a fair wind t' ye, %1$s. Whatever ye do today, please stay safe.
guard.dialogue.main.morning/2: If thar's one perk about bein' a guard, it's that ye can rest when the sun be up. Unfortunately, 'tisn't jus' monsters we 'ave t' worry about…
guard.dialogue.main.morning/3: Ye're nah causin' any trouble around here, are ye?
guard.dialogue.main.morning/4: *Be clearly too focused on the patrol t' notice ye*
guard.dialogue.main.morning/5: Aye, I know thar ne'er are any monsters in the daytime… but I always can nah help but see illagers in any bush I turn me head t'. Maybe I mighty needs a nap, aft all…*
guard.dialogue.main.morning/6: Here's luck 'n a fair wind t' ye, %1$s. Remember t' make a report if ye see anythin' suspiciousshiver me timbers?
guard.dialogue.main.morning/7: When the last raid happened, 'twas 'cause we didn' notice illager scouts. 'twon't ever happen again.
guard.dialogue.main.morning/8: Oh, ahoy, %1$s. Do ye wants t' keep me crew on me watch?.
guard.dialogue.main.morning/9: Ahoy. Ye can feel safe now. Thar are no monsters durin' the day. Well, most o' the time.
guard.dialogue.main.morning/10: Ye aren't doin' anythin' suspicious, are ye…? Oh, no, I be only askin'… jus' askin'… hehehe….
guard.dialogue.main.evening/1: It's goin' t' be nighttime soon. Ye shall like enough head indoors.
guard.dialogue.main.evening/2: The settin' sun sure looks beautiful… I jus' wish it didn' mean more monsters t' deal wit'. Eh.
guard.dialogue.main.evening/3: Jus' between ye 'n me, I mighty wish I could jus' head home fer the day 'n nah worry about any zombies or skeletons.
guard.dialogue.main.evening/4: It's evenin' already. I be nah sure if we best be natterin' right now...
guard.dialogue.main.evening/5: Guard duty ain't as depressin' as some say. It's great if ye needs lots o' time t' reckon… nah that I slack off at me post, gods forbid!
guard.dialogue.main.evening/6: I used t' dream about bein' a guard when I was jus' a sprog, but a life o' a guard ain't as grand as I thought. Then again, the more borin' yer job as a guard be, the better.
guard.dialogue.main.evening/7: I used t' go into the caves jus' like ye, back when I was trainin' t' become a guard.
guard.dialogue.main.evening/8: The monsters will come out any minute now. Head indoors if ye don't wants t' 'ave t' fight 'em.
guard.dialogue.main.evening/9: If ye ever find yourself in trouble, jus' find me. I will do everythin' I can t' help.
guard.dialogue.main.evening/10: Don't stray too far from the village if ye're nah well prepared, %1$s.
guard.dialogue.main.night/1: I jus' hate those zombies, 'n thar's ne'er an end t' 'em!
guard.dialogue.main.night/2: If ye wants t' be helpful, ye can watch here fer the monsters wit' me.
guard.dialogue.main.night/3: ... shall I make another round, already?
guard.dialogue.main.night/4: Make sure t' gangway fer these black spotted creepers, %1$s.
guard.dialogue.main.night/5: I be sometimes nah sure wha' I hate more. Creepers, or skeletons?
guard.dialogue.main.night/6: A few days ago, I had t' put down a zombie that clearly wasn't gone far enough t' be cured… moments like these haunt me when I try t' sleep.
guard.dialogue.main.night/7: Make sure nah t' run in a straight line when ye're facin' a skeleton. Thar arrows can be deadly.
guard.dialogue.main.night/8: ... I hope thar won't be a zombie siege tonight.
guard.dialogue.main.night/9: I jus' wants fer this night t' be finally o'er.
guard.dialogue.main.night10: Aye, we get scared too sometimes, but bravery ain't the lack o' fear, it's the ability t' control it fer the greater cause. Now that I be yellow-bellied. Wha'?
farmer.dialogue.main.morning/1: Another mornin', another day spent in the fields.
farmer.dialogue.main.morning/2: It's hard work t' be a farmer, but it mighty pays off.
farmer.dialogue.main.morning3: One perk o' bein' a farmer: it's up t' ye wha' grub ye get t' eat later!
farmer.dialogue.main.evening/1: 'twas yet another productive day in the fields. I reckon I deserve some rest, now.
farmer.dialogue.main.evening/2: I love bein' a farmer, but it's hard on ye. I be mighty glad whenever the day's o'er 'n I can jus' relax.
farmer.dialogue.main.evening/3: I hope naught be tramplin' me fields right now…
farmer.dialogue.main.night/1: *Yawns* On the morrow will be another day o' hard work in the fields. I needs all the rest I can get..
farmer.dialogue.main.night/2: Me body feels so sore aft today… I feel like I can sleep like a log…
farmer.dialogue.main.night/3: Ye shall like enough sleep, too. 'n since it's me job t' feed everyone in the village, I don't reckon I best be natterin' t' ye this late, either.
butcher.dialogue.main.morning/1: I be sure the smell o' fresh meat will lighten up the day fer everyone.
butcher.dialogue.main.morning/2: Thar's more t' me work than jus' scuttlin' pigs, ye know. I be workin' jus' as hard as anyone in the village.
butcher.dialogue.main.morning/3: Yarr. This meat looks so good I'd like t' 'ave some meself.
butcher.dialogue.main.evening/1: Well, that was a productive day. I've sure fed lots o' scallywags in the village.
butcher.dialogue.main.evening/2: I be nah mighty at work right now, but if ye've got the doubloons 'n wants some quality, fresh meat, I be still up fer some tradin'.
butcher.dialogue.main.evening/3: I shall like enough make sure the animals breed on the morrow, I've been startin' t' run low… blow me down? We be ye sayin' somethin'?
butcher.dialogue.main.night/1: I shall like enough be in cot. Scallywags will wants t' buy some quality meat early on the morrow, 'n so I can nah act be actin' like a night owl.
butcher.dialogue.main.night/2: Blisterin' barnacles? Wha'? Do ye wants t' buy some pork at this hour? Are ye mighty serious?
butcher.dialogue.main.night/3: The butcher's work might nah look tough, but darn, me body mighty be sore all o'er. I mighty needs t' go t' sleep.
shepherd.dialogue.main.morning/1: Blow me down, I be so tired. Then again, I can nah jus' sleep in, or me animals will go starvin'..
shepherd.dialogue.main.morning/2: Blow me down? Can nah wait it a wee? I be… *yawn* still so sleepy. Me sheep kept me up at night far too long…
shepherd.dialogue.main.morning/3: Work wit' wool can be a bit tirin' sometimes, but it sure be rewardin'. I be speakin' from experience!.
shepherd.dialogue.main.evening/1: Wha'? Time off? Well, I still needs t' feed the sheep afore I go t' bed, but I guess I be kind o' free, now.
shepherd.dialogue.main.evening/2: If ye wants t' trade some wool, now 'twould be good time t' do it. I finally 'ave some more time on me hands.
shepherd.dialogue.main.evening/3: Don't tell anyone… but I mighty like mutton. Roast mutton, minced mutton, muttons steak… jus' don't mention it nigh the sheep!
shepherd.dialogue.main.night/1: I mighty hope me sheep are quiet today. Maybe I'll catch some good sleep..
shepherd.dialogue.main.night/2: I shall call it a night. I needs t' get up early t' feed me animals.
shepherd.dialogue.main.night/3: Ain't thar some better time fer us t' trade? I be sure ye can find some better time t' sell me wool. *Yawn.*.
shepherd.dialogue.main.night/4: Havin' trouble fallin' asleep? Try countin' sheep.
shepherd.dialogue.main.night/5: Finally I've caught that runaway sheep!
fisherman.dialogue.main.morning/1: When fishin', it's always best t' start early in the day. That's how ye get the most out o' the day!
fisherman.dialogue.main.morning/2: Do ye 'ave some materials t' spare? Believe it or nah,  but fishin' rods don't last that long…
fisherman.dialogue.main.morning/3: I sometimes feel sorry fer these poor fish, but it's up t' all o' us t' feed the village. It's in the cycle o' nature.
fisherman.dialogue.main.evening/1: 'twas a day well spent! Would ye believe how many catches I've got?!.
fisherman.dialogue.main.evening/2: I be nah mighty on the clock right now, but if ye 'ave some quality fish t' sell, then hit me wit' it. I be always open t' a good trade!
fisherman.dialogue.main.evening/3: No, I didn' become a fisherman 'cause I liked fish. … I do like fish, though. Who doesn't? It's definitely nah as heavy on stomach as pork or beef.
fisherman.dialogue.main.night/1: Hum? How can I help ye? Sorry, but I mighty needs t' get t' bed, or I will 'ave a bad day fishin' on the morrow…
fisherman.dialogue.main.night/2: Wha'…? Don't tell me ye've hit me up at this hour jus' t' sell fish…?
fisherman.dialogue.main.night/3: I know fishin' might nah look too hard, but I be mighty tired aft fishin' up till the afternoon. Can nah we natter on the morrow?
toolsmith.dialogue.main.morning/1: Here's luck 'n a fair wind t' ye, %1$s! Do ye happen t' be in needs o' some new, quality tools?!
toolsmith.dialogue.main.morning/2: It's sometimes hard t' get meself t' be fully awake, but then I always remind meself that the village relies on the tools I make. So, I can nah allow meself t' be lazy.
toolsmith.dialogue.main.morning/3: Do ye happen t' 'ave some quality materials on hand? I could mighty use some.
toolsmith.dialogue.main.evening/1: Blimey, that was a full day o' work. It always makes me proud t' see scallywags use me tools, though
toolsmith.dialogue.main.evening/2: Aye, I be technically off the clock now, but if ye wants t' trade fer a bit, I be still open. I didn' get entirely sold out.
toolsmith.dialogue.main.evening/3: I love t' make tools, but wha' I love even more be t' get t' jus' relax aft a full day o' work!
toolsmith.dialogue.main.night/1: I best be in hammock already. Tools take time t' make, so I unfortunately can nah afford sleep in too much.
toolsmith.dialogue.main.night/2: Blimey? Why are ye here at this hour? Don't tell me ye wants t' buy tools so late!
toolsmith.dialogue.main.night/3: Can nah we natter later? It might nah look hard, but I be actually tired aft today's toolsmithin' work…
armorer.dialogue.main.morning/1: I be proud o' me work, but gods, ain't it tough t' work all day by this black spotted blast furnace…
armorer.dialogue.main.morning/2: If ye happen t' 'ave some resources ye'd be willin' t' sell, I would be mighty grateful. It can be difficult t' get me owns sometimes.
armorer.dialogue.main.morning/3: It's so hot in here. I mighty wish I could jus' go outside today.
armorer.dialogue.main.evening/1: I take a lot o' pride in bein' an armorer. It takes a lot o' skill t' create quality armor.
armorer.dialogue.main.evening/2: I be technically nah on the job right now, but aye, I 'ave some pieces o' armor if ye wants t' buy any. I ne'er get fully sold out..
armorer.dialogue.main.evening/3: I take pride in me job, but I be glad t' be away from that scorchin' hot blast furnace. It nigh-on makes me wants t' jump into powder snow. Well-nigh.
armorer.dialogue.main.night/1: Can nah we natter anytime later? I needs t' sleep. A tired blacksmith be a bad blacksmith..
armorer.dialogue.main.night/2: ... please don't tell me ye got me out o' hammock jus' t' buy armor?
armorer.dialogue.main.night/3: Makin' armor be mighty tirin', especially when ye 'ave t' work next t' a smokin' hot furnace. I can nah wait t' get into bed already.
weaponsmith.dialogue.main.morning/1: Why, ahoy. Do ye perhaps needs a new cutlass? Or an axe? Or a bell?! Jus' kiddin'… unless?
weaponsmith.dialogue.main.morning/2: Ahoy. If ye happen t' find yourself wit' some spare resources, I'll happily buy 'em off ye. Weaponsmithin' takes up a lot o' 'em, ye know.
weaponsmith.dialogue.main.morning/3: Smithin' quality weapons takes time. I would know.
weaponsmith.dialogue.main.evening/1: If ye needs a new weapon, don't hesitate t' ask. I barely ever get fully sold out.
weaponsmith.dialogue.main.evening/2: I suppose it's nice t' jus' sit down 'n rest aft a whole day o' workin' on weapons.
weaponsmith.dialogue.main.evening/3: I know an adventurer likes ye must appreciate well-made weapons. Blimey? No, no, jus' sayin'… mighty. Why are ye lookin' at me that way?
weaponsmith.dialogue.main.night/1: ... haven't ye had the whole day t' go shoppin' fer weapons?
weaponsmith.dialogue.main.night/2: I be soooo tired. 'n if I don't get me sleep I won't be able t' smith a hoe, much less a functional cutlass!
weaponsmith.dialogue.main.night/3: I know ye must be passionate about cutlasses, but can nah we natter about 'em later? It's too late fer that now.
dialogue.greet.mayor/1: Here's luck 'n a fair wind t' ye, mayor!
dialogue.busy/1: We already nattered a lot today, I needs t' go back t' work.
dialogue.busy/2: Look, I be flattered, but I mighty needs t' get this work done by this evenin'.
dialogue.busy/3: I be a wee busy right now, mind if we chat later?
dialogue.busy/4: Sorry, but I needs t' work, I'll natter t' ye later.
dialogue.busy/5: I forgot me furnace lit, natter t' ye later!
dialogue.goaway/2: Don't ye 'ave anythin' better t' do?
dialogue.goaway/3: Sorry, %1$s, can nah natter right now.
dialogue.greet/1: Ahoy! How are ye doin' today?
dialogue.greet/3: Oh, ahoy. Did ye needs somethin'?
dialogue.greet/4: Ye look ready t' take on the day! How's it goin'?
dialogue.greet/8: Ahoy! It's lovely t' Godspeed. How are ye today?
dialogue.greet/9: Ahoy! Glad t' fair winds t' ye!
male.childp.dialogue.greet/1: Ahoy cap'n! Wha' are ye up t'?
male.childp.dialogue.greet/2: Ahoy cap'n, how are ye doin'?
male.childp.dialogue.greet/3: Ahoy cap'n! Missed ye, wha' are ye doin' right now?
male.childp.dialogue.greet/4: Ahoy cap'n? Where are ye goin'?
male.childp.dialogue.greet/6: Ahoy cap'n, are thar chores ye wants me t' do right now?
female.childp.dialogue.greet/1: Ahoy mom, wha' are ye up t'?
female.childp.dialogue.greet/3: Mom! I missed ye, wha' are ye doin' right now?
female.childp.dialogue.greet/6: Ahoy mom, are thar any chores I can help wit' around the ship?
male.teenp.dialogue.greet/3: Ahoy cap'n! *hugs ye* Wha' are ye up t'?
male.teenp.dialogue.greet/5: Ahoy cap'n! Be thar anythin' ye needs help wit'?
female.teenp.dialogue.greet/3: Ahoy ma! *hugs ye* Wha' are ye up t'?
female.teenp.dialogue.greet/5: Ahoy ma! Do ye needs help around the ship?
male.adultp.dialogue.greet/1: Ahoy pops! Wha' are ye up t'?
male.adultp.dialogue.greet/2: Ahoy ole scallywag, how things wit' ye 'n mom?
male.adultp.dialogue.greet/3: Ahoy cap'n! Missed ye, wha' are ye doin' right now?
male.adultp.dialogue.greet/4: *hugs* Ahoy cap'n! It's been a bit, wha' are ye up t' nowadays?
male.adultp.dialogue.greet/6: Wha''s up cap'n? Ye doin' alright?
female.adultp.dialogue.greet/1: Ahoy mom! Wha' are ye up t'?
female.adultp.dialogue.greet/2: Ahoy ole beauty! *laughs* how things wit' ye 'n cap'n?
female.adultp.dialogue.greet/3: *hugs tightly* Ahoy ma! Missed ye, wha' are ye doin' right now?
female.adultp.dialogue.greet/4: Ahoy mom! It's been a bit, wha' are ye up t' nowadays?
female.adultp.dialogue.greet/6: Wha''s up mom? Ye doin' alright?
female.adultp.dialogue.greet/7: *hugs* Mamahow fares yer day? Do ye needs a hand?
dialogue.greet.negative/1: Garr, walk the plank, ye're the LAST scallywag I wanted t' see!
dialogue.greet.negative/2: Shiver me timbers, look who's back. Again.
dialogue.greet.negative/4: Oh. It's jus' ye. I was expectin' someone else.
male.toddlerp.dialogue.greet.negative/1: I don't like ye right now cap'n!
female.toddlerp.dialogue.greet.negative/: I don't like ye right now mama!
male.childp.dialogue.greet.negative/1: I don't wants t' natter right now cap'n!
male.childp.dialogue.greet.negative/4: I wants t' be alone right now cap'n.
female.childp.dialogue.greet.negative/1: I don't wants t' natter t' ye right now mom!
female.childp.dialogue.greet.negative/4: I wants t' be alone right now mom.
male.teenp.dialogue.greet.negative/3: *furl eyes* Wha' be it ole scallywag?
male.teenp.dialogue.greet.negative/4: Cap'n, I've more important things right now, walk the plank!
female.teenp.dialogue.greet.negative/1: Blimey! Wha' do ye wants mom?
female.teenp.dialogue.greet.negative/2: Mom, I be nah in the mood right now!
female.teenp.dialogue.greet.negative/3: *furl eyes* Wha' be it ole proud beauty?
female.teenp.dialogue.greet.negative/4: Mom, I've more important things right now, walk the plank!
male.adultp.dialogue.greet.negative/1: Pops! I don't care right now! Walk the plank!
male.adultp.dialogue.greet.negative/2: I don't wants t' natter t' ye fer a while cap'n.
male.adultp.dialogue.greet.negative/3: Cap'n, I don't wants t' Godspeed fer a wee bit.
male.adultp.dialogue.greet.negative/4: Cap'n! I be grown up, leave me alone!
male.adultp.dialogue.greet.negative/5: Cap'n, I be havin' a good day right now, I don't wants t' ruin it natterin' t' ye.
male.adultp.dialogue.greet.negative/6: Cap'n, I've been havin' a bad day, don't make it worse botherin' me please.
female.adultp.dialogue.greet.negative/1: Mom! I don't care about wha' ye 'ave t' say right now! Walk the plank!
female.adultp.dialogue.greet.negative/2: I love ye mom, but I don't wants t' natter t' ye fer a while.
female.adultp.dialogue.greet.negative/3: Mom, I don't wants t' fair winds t' ye around fer a wee bit.
female.adultp.dialogue.greet.negative/4: Mom, I be on me owns fer a reason, leave me alone please!
female.adultp.dialogue.greet.negative/5: Ma, I be havin' a good day right now, I don't wants t' ruin it natterin' t' ye.
female.adultp.dialogue.greet.negative/6: Mom, I've been havin' a bad day, please don't make it worse botherin' me.
dialogue.apologize.success/2: It's aye, jus' watch yourself next time
dialogue.apologize.success/3: I guess that's aye, jus' be careful.
dialogue.apologize.fail/3: Aye, like I be gonna fall fer that one!
dialogue.location.failed/1: Shiver me timbers, no I heard naught new.
dialogue.location.failed/2: Sorry, but no, thar's no interestin' places I'd be aware o'.
dialogue.location.failed/3: No, I don't reckon so. Sorry, but we've got better things t' do than searchin' fer some monster-filled ruins like ye adventurers.
dialogue.location.forgot/1: Oh, I had found a cool location, but I forgot t' mark it on the map. Sorry.
dialogue.location.forgot/2: Lookin' fer somethin' interestin'? Aye, thar was-... wait… waitarrrgh! I had it on the tip o' me tongue! Sorry, I forgot t' write that down.
dialogue.location.forgot/3: Aye, thar was somethin', but I jus' forgot! I be so sorry!.
dialogue.location.igloo/1: I found an igloo at %2$s. Who would wants t' live in a galleon made o' snow? Brrr!
dialogue.location.igloo/2: Now that I reckon o' it… thar's an marooned igloo at %2$s. I don't reckon anyone lives thar. 'n, jus' between ye 'n me, the ship might be haunted. I always hear weird noises whenever I walk by…
dialogue.location.igloo/3: At %2$s thar be an marooned galleon made o' naught but ice. An igloo, I reckon 'twas called. I reckon it's been marooned fer a good while.
dialogue.location.pyramid/2: They say thar's a pyramid at %2$s. Who knows, maybe ye could find some worthwhile booty in thar?
dialogue.location.pyramid/3: If ye head t' %2$s, ye will find a pyramid. Thar was one adventurer, jus' like ye, who went t' investigate some good while ago, but we haven't heard from 'im since. Be careful.
dialogue.location.ruined_portal_desert/1: Thar's a destroyed portal at %2$s, in the middle o' the desert.
dialogue.location.ruined_portal_swamp/1: Thar's a destroyed portal at %2$s, in the middle o' the swamp. The invaders from the Nether didn' expect t' land in this dump.
dialogue.location.ruined_portal/1: Thar be a destroyed portal at %2$s, the aftermath o' a Nether invasion.
dialogue.location.ruined_portal/2: Head t' %2$s, 'n ye'll find a ruined nether portal. It looks pretty damn creepy if ye ask me, but it best be safe. Jus' don't step on the magma.
dialogue.location.ruined_portal/3: If ye go t' %2$s, ye'll find some ancient ruins. The local cleric says it used t' be a nether portal. Some also say thar might be loot, but nobody wants t' go anywhere nigh that ship
dialogue.location.ruined_portal_mountain: Thar's a destroyed portal at %2$s in the mountains.
dialogue.location.mansion/1: If ye go t' %2$s, then ye'll find a mansion owned by the illagers. If ye value yer life, don't come anywhere nigh that black spotted galleon.
dialogue.location.mansion/2: Thar's this giant mansion at %2$s owned by illagers. I dunno, but if ye ask me, maybe we mighty shall move the village… far away from here, preferably…
dialogue.location.monument/1: Thar be a sunken castle guarded by sea monsters at %2$s. Steer clear o' it.
dialogue.location.monument/2: Thar are tales o' ancient ruins deep in the ocean at %2$s. Ye might find booty in thar, but 'tis goin' t' be dangerous.
dialogue.location.shipwreck/1: I found a sunken ship at %2$s. This sunken ships in the oceans once belonged t' the Eastern Alliance Crew.
dialogue.location.shipwreck/2: I've heard some fishermen stumbled on a shipwreck at %2$s. I wonder if thar be some loot hidden inside…
dialogue.location.shipwreck_beached/1: I found a ruined ship at %2$s, at the beach. Ye can nah wench it.
dialogue.location.shipwreck_beached/2: Go t' %2$s, 'n ye will find a ship wrecked on the shore. I wonder how it ended up thar, though…
dialogue.location.village_desert/1: At %2$s be another lovely village, in the middle o' a desert.
dialogue.location.village_taiga/1: At %2$s be another lovely village, in the middle o' a taiga biome.
dialogue.location.village_taiga/2: Go t' %2$s 'n ye will find another village. It's deep in the taiga biome, if I remember it right.
dialogue.location.village_snowy/1: At %2$s be another village. It's mighty cold thar.
dialogue.location.village_snowy/2: Thar be another village at %2$s in snowy plains. The scallywags are so nice, but it's so cold in thar!.
dialogue.location.village_plains/2: Deep into the plain at %2$s ye will find another village.
dialogue.location.village_savanna/1: At %2$s be another village. It's soooo hot o'er thar.
dialogue.location.village_savanna/2: In the savanna at %2$s, ye can find another village. Mighty nice scallywags, too!
dialogue.location.swamp_hut/1: Thar be a witch livin' in the swamp at %2$s. If I we be ye, I would avoid that damn galleon.
dialogue.location.swamp_hut/2: If I we be ye, I would avoid %2$s. Thar's this hut owned by that foul witch, 'n trust me, ye don't wants t' be anywhere nearby.
dialogue.location.mineshaft/1: We used t' 'ave a mine here, but it got closed aft that one accident. Best be around %2$s.
dialogue.location.mineshaft/2: Oh, aye. Thar was this mine we once owned, right at %2$s, but it got infested wit' monsters 'n 'tisn't safe anymore. Please be careful if ye choose t' go down thar.
dialogue.location.jungle_pyramid/1: Thar be an ancient temple at %2$s. If ye value yer life, ye shall avoid it or ye might get scuttled by one o' the traps.
dialogue.location.jungle_pyramid/2: If ye go t' %2$s in the nearby jungle, ye will find ancient ruins. I won't tell ye wha' t' do, but be careful if ye go. By some miracle, those ancient traps still work.. Otherwise, our forefathers would 'ave looted the ship ourselves decades ago.
dialogue.location.pillager_outpost/1: Thar be a group o' Pillagers at %2$s. They set up an outpost right next t' us. Hopefully they won't attack us too soon, we can nah stand another attack.
dialogue.location.pillager_outpost/2: Thar's this outpost owned by pillagers at %2$s that won't let us sleep at night. If ye go anywhere nigh thar, be careful. They shoot on sight.
dialogue.location.pillager_outpost/3: Well… if ye head t' %2$s, ye will find an outpost owned by the pillagers. If ye can best those wretched villains, maybe ye'll find some worthwhile loot. The entire village would be thankful if someone took care o' 'em.
dialogue.location.ancient_city/0: I heard weird noises at %2$s, deep underground.
dialogue.location.ancient_city/1: I think something is hidden far beneath the ground at %2$s.
dialogue.location.ancient_city/3: Legends say at %2$s is an ancient city. I didn't see anything tho, maybe its underground?
dialogue.joke.monster.success/1: Har har har! Serves that Skelly right!
dialogue.joke.monster.success/2: Wha'? That zombie mighty tried t' beat ye t' death wit' a shovel? Har har har!
dialogue.joke.monster.success/3: Ye mighty showed that spider who's boss! Har har har!
dialogue.joke.monster.success/4: Ahoy, ye mighty got a skeleton t' scuttle a creeper?! Now that's amazin', har har har!!
dialogue.joke.monster.success/5: Har har har! God, are cave spiders mighty this squiffy?!
dialogue.joke.monster.failed/1: Skeletons are sentient beings! How dare ye!
dialogue.joke.monster.failed/2: ... Who jokes about creepers blowin' up in this day 'n age? Seriously!
dialogue.joke.monster.failed/3: Zombies 'n skeletons used t' be humans jus' like us, in case ye forgot.
dialogue.joke.monster.failed/4: Arrr. An enderman fell into water. Soooo original.
dialogue.joke.monster.failed/5: If I had a shillin' fer every time someone joked about bein' ambushed by a silverfish on the head, I would 'ave two shillings. 'n 'tisn't much, but it's weird it has jus' happened again.
dialogue.joke.animal.success/1: Unfortunate fer the sheep t' lose its wool, but funny!
dialogue.joke.animal.success/2: Then the wolf fell in love wit' the sheep.
dialogue.joke.animal.success/3: That's hilarious! I can nah believe chickens can do that!
dialogue.joke.animal.success/4: That's so squiffy, i love it!
dialogue.joke.animal.failed/2: That poor sheep! That's nah funny at all!
dialogue.joke.animal.failed/3: Don't speak about me pig like that!
dialogue.joke.animal.failed/5: Don't joke about the cow's eyebrows like that!
dialogue.flirt.slap/2: Did a Vindicator teach ye how t' flirt?!
dialogue.kiss.slap/2: Try that again, 'n the next one's goin' t' leave a mark!
dialogue.chat.plains/1: Do ye like the plains? I've ne'er been anywhere else. I shall travel one day...
dialogue.chat.plains/2: The plains are so peaceful. Even if 'tisn't as excitin' as 'tis in other biomes, I still wouldna wants t' live anywhere else.
dialogue.chat.plains/3: Sometimes at night, the plains biome be mighty beautiful t' look at 'n listen t'.
dialogue.chat.plains/4: Times like this, I'd jus' lay down 'n look at the sky 'n clouds.
dialogue.chat.plains/5: The air here be so swab 'n fresh! Maybe better than taiga!
dialogue.chat.plains/6: Although the plains are plain, sometimes plain 'n simple are the best!
dialogue.chat.plains/7: Weather like this reminds me when I picked wild flowers as a sprog. I had a crush on Ash, so I always gave 'em the flowers.
dialogue.chat.plains/8: The mornin' sunrise be mighty pretty in the plains! Ye shall observe it sometime.
dialogue.chat.savanna/1: It's hot o'er here in the savanna, but at least we ne'er 'ave t' worry about the winter.
dialogue.chat.savanna/2: The llamas are sort o' annoyin', but I enjoy it here.
dialogue.chat.savanna/3: I love the architecture here in the savanna. It's mighty unique 'n be one o' the main reasons I live here.
dialogue.chat.savanna/4: Don't underestimate the savanna biome. It may look plain 'n generic, but it does 'ave its perks.
dialogue.chat.savanna/5: One advantage we 'ave o'er the desert villages be even though it may nah rain here, we still 'ave rivers.
dialogue.chat.savanna/6: Some o' the hills 'n terrains here are mighty interestin'! Such a sight.
dialogue.chat.savanna/7: When it gets hot, the acacia trees havin' so much shade helps me get through work days!
dialogue.chat.savanna/8: Savanna villages usually 'ave some o' the best melons 'n pumpkins in the world, we often trade wit' other villages!
dialogue.chat.taiga/1: I like the woods. They provide buildin' material, firewood, 'n are great huntin' grounds.
dialogue.chat.taiga/2: Some say it's cold here in the taiga biome, but if ye ask me, we 'ave well-nigh all we needs here. I wouldna change it fer anythin'!
dialogue.chat.taiga/3: Taiga forests are so cool! I love the sweet berries.
dialogue.chat.taiga/4: I adore foxes here in the taiga forests. I feed 'em sweet berries sometimes. Such mischievous creatures.
dialogue.chat.taiga/5: Since thar be a lot o' potential grub here, the wolves are pretty tame wit' us.
dialogue.chat.taiga/6: The fresh crisp air the taiga brings be so relaxin' at times.
dialogue.chat.taiga/7: Although the sweet berry bushes 'ave the best berries, gettin' pricked by one be ghastly!
dialogue.chat.taiga/8: The rain here in the taiga gets pretty cold, but it's mighty peaceful t' say the least.
child.dialogue.chat.taiga/1: Did ye see the foxes? I mighty wants one as a pet, but they be so fast. Can ye catch one fer me?
dialogue.chat.snowy_plains/1: It's cold here, but as long as thar be enough firewood it's no problem fer me.
dialogue.chat.snowy_plains/2: It's freezin' out here, but at least thar's plenty o' fish. Har har har!
dialogue.chat.snowy_plains/3: In weather like this, it's perfect fer snugglin' meself in a blanket readin' a book by the furnace!
dialogue.chat.snowy_plains/4: When it snows here, it takes me back t' me childhood where me 'n a couple o' mateys would 'ave snowball fights. I mighty wench those times.
dialogue.chat.snowy_plains/5: At night, the strays are ghastly when walkin' around the village, thar tipped arrows suck!
dialogue.chat.snowy_plains/6: Be careful o' wolves, the guards 'ave spotted some nearby.
dialogue.chat.snowy_plains/7: One thing I find fearful be when ye touch an iron golem. Ye're nigh-on stuck fer the whole day!
dialogue.chat.snowy_plains/8: When I was a sprog, me elders would bring me a pumpkin. I always built snow golems wit' 'em aft we used the pumpkin fer pie!
dialogue.chat.desert/1: It's hot here in the desert, but at least we ne'er 'ave t' worry about the winter.
dialogue.chat.desert/2: The desert be warm all year round.
dialogue.chat.desert/3: Although it's hot here in the desert, I'll always 'ave a tan, or a sunburn..
dialogue.chat.desert/4: At night it's mighty scenic 'n cooler, mighty nice t' look at the stars.
dialogue.chat.desert/5: Shiver me timbers! Ne'er thought I'd say this, but the sun be pretty bad today.
dialogue.chat.desert/6: Blimey! The sun be pretty bad today!
dialogue.chat.desert/7: 'ave ye found any rabbits? They be hard t' see here!
dialogue.chat.desert/8: One downside about livin' here are the husks. No matter wha', ye get super starvin' when they smack ye! Wha' gives!?
dialogue.chat.desert/9: Pricked meself on a cactus the other day. Gotta mind yer step around here!
dialogue.chat.desert/10: Life in the dry desert ain't easy, but at least we 'ave this village where we can get water 'n grub.
dialogue.story.exploring.success/1: Blimey! I'll explore the world too, one day!.
dialogue.story.exploring.success/2: Blimey! It must be amazin' t' jus' get t' travel 'n explore. I love me village, family 'n mateys, but listenin' t' ye mighty makes me feel jealous!
dialogue.story.exploring.success/3: Ye must be mighty brave t' jus' go 'n explore the unknown.
dialogue.story.exploring.fail/2: Blow me down. Don't cut yourself on that edge, tough scallywag.
dialogue.story.exploring.fail/3: Talking to you feels like talking to a child who they want to be when they grow up. Without the adorable part, that is.
dialogue.story.nether.success/2: Blisterin' barnacles, how 'ave ye even managed t' survive in such a treacherous galleon? I be impressed.
dialogue.story.nether.success/3: I've heard thar be lots o' booty in the Nether fer those brave enough t' go thar. If only I we be brave enough t' try 'n set foot in the Nether…
dialogue.story.nether.success/4: Ye must be mighty brave t' go thar. Aren't ye scared when ye go? N-Nah that I would be…
dialogue.story.nether.fail/1: I don't reckon ye've ever set foot into the Nether.
dialogue.story.nether.fail/2: ... now I get why those Piglins attacked ye.
dialogue.story.nether.fail/3: I don't care if ye've been t' the Nether. Ye couldn't tell a tale t' save yer life.
dialogue.story.nether.fail/4: ... ye don't look well-nigh strong enough t' go t' the Nether.
dialogue.story.nether.fail/5: Me grandpa used t' explore the Nether, 'n he ne'er told me about warped fungus. Ye liar!
dialogue.story.enderdragon.success/1: Incredible! 'n did ye bring the dragon egg wit' ye?
dialogue.story.enderdragon.success/2: Oh me! 'ave ye mighty scuttled the mighty dragon o' legend?! The village will sing o' yer endeavors fer generations!
dialogue.story.enderdragon.fail/1: Har! 'ave ye gone nuts?. The ender dragon be a myth.
dialogue.story.enderdragon.fail/2: Ye must be jokin'. No human could even hope t' scratch that dragon!
dialogue.story.wither.success/1: Impossible! I've heard the Wither causes unimaginable destruction!
dialogue.story.wither.success/2: Ye've bested even the Wither?! T-That's incredible!
dialogue.story.wither.fail/2: Ye look too much in one piece fer that t' be true.
dialogue.divorce: Do ye mighty wants a divorce? A cleric can provide divorce papers t' decrease penalties.
dialogue.procreate: Do ye mighty wants a sprog?
dialogue.adopt: Do ye mighty wants t' be me elder?
dialogue.stay.fail/1: Nay thanks, I be more the adventurer.
dialogue.stay.fail/2: Thanks fer askin', but I prefer t' venture 'n explore the world!
dialogue.stay.fail/3: It's a nice village, but I be more the adventurer type.
dialogue.stay.repeat/1: Ye already asked me this riddle.
dialogue.stay.success/1: Thanks, I would love t' stay at this village!
dialogue.stay.success/2: Yarr, I would love t' stay at this village!
dialogue.stay.no_space/1: Blimey, this village seems pretty crowded already.
dialogue.stay.no_space/2: Maybe I would like t' stay, but thar are no beds left.
dialogue.divorcePapers: Here ye go, bring these papers t' yer spouse t' confirm the divorce.
dialogue.hire/1: Blisterin' barnacles, jus' tell me when ye needs help. I will be around fer the paid time.
dialogue.hire/2: Blisterin' barnacles! Let me know when ye needs me. I'll be here fer the emeralds!
dialogue.hire/3: Shiver me timbers! Ye won't be disappointed! Jus' 'ave the emeralds ready!
dialogue.no_money/1: Ye needs more emeralds t' hire me!
dialogue.no_money/2: Are ye trying t' rip me off? Ye needs more emeralds!
dialogue.no_money/3: I may look cheap, but me services aren't. Ye will needs more t' hire me.
villager.grieving/1: How could this happen? He was always so full o' life.
villager.grieving/2: I can nah believe she be gone. 'tis jus' too much t' bear.
villager.grieving/3: Why did ye 'ave t' leave us so soon.
villager.grieving/4: I be goin' t' wench ye so much.
villager.grieving/5: I dunno how I'll go on without ye.
villager.grieving/6: This grave be a constant reminder o' the pain I feel without ye.
villager.grieving/7: I hope ye're in a better galleon now
villager.grieving/8: I'll always cherish the memories I 'ave wit' ye
dialogue.rock_paper_scissor/2: I be goin' t' beat ye this time!
dialogue.rock_paper_scissor.loose.paper/: I be goin' t' go wit' scissors this time!
dialogue.rock_paper_scissor.win.rock/1: Yarr, rock crushes scissor, I lost.
dialogue.rock_paper_scissor.win.paper/1: I can ne'er seem t' win wit' rock.
dialogue.rock_paper_scissor.win.scissor/: Scissors cut paper, ye got me this time.
